headline: Ask HN: What hyper-focused industry newsletters do you enjoy?
description:
In my experience, HN users tend to have incredibly specialized interests. I'm curious about what newsletters are out there that deliver a depth of specialized knowledge?

For me, it doesn't get better than 'The Prepared' and the 'Future of Trucks' newsletters. Both provide a window into technicalities that I wouldn't otherwise think about in fields that I'm broadly interested in.

https://theprepared.org/ https://www.trucks.vc/newsletter
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你喜欢哪些超关注的行业通讯？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你喜歡哪些超關注的行業通訊？
description_zh-Hans:
根据我的经验，HN用户往往有令人难以置信的专业兴趣。我很好奇，有哪些通讯可以提供深入的专业知识？

对我来说，没有比'The Prepared'和'Future of Trucks'通讯更好的了。Both provide a window into technicalities that I wouldn't otherwise think about in fields that I'm broadly interested in.

https://theprepared.org/ https://www.trucks.vc/newsletter
description_zh-Hant:
根據我的經驗，HN用戶往往有令人難以置信的專業興趣。我很好奇，有哪些通訊可以提供深入的專業知識？

對我來說，沒有比'The Prepared'和'Future of Trucks'通訊更好的了。Both provide a window into technicalities that I wouldn't otherwise think about in fields that I'm broadly interested in.

https://theprepared.org/ https://www.trucks.vc/newsletter
